name: 8 Minute Apocalypse
description:
8 Minute Apocalypse is a love letter to Arcade Shoot Em' Ups from the 80's and 90's that uniquely uses 3D character models within 2D space.

Your world is under attack by the Synthetic Army known as the ONE, under control of the most powerful A.I. in the universe.

Their A.I. master is coming to finish the job. You must intercept them before they make it to the planet...

ETA: 8 minutes!

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Enter key to Shoot

Controllers are supported!

Note: This game was required to be made for a 1920 x 1080 display. Because this game was made off of a laptop we attempted to compensate but some issues may appear due to this.
